product_name: MPOWERD Luci Lux Inflatable Solar Lantern
long_description: With an array of 10 LEDs and a warm, frosted finish, this solar-powered lantern casts evenly diffused light for elegant dinner parties, soft-lit campsites and quiet nighttime dips in the pool.
short_description: With an array of 10 LEDs and a warm, frosted finish, this solar-powered lantern casts evenly diffused light for elegant dinner parties, soft-lit campsites and quiet nighttime dips in the pool.
